name: list_folder_contents
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool git_pager.
Tool description: Easility perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) operations on any Github repo!
API description: Retrieves the contents of a specified Github repository folder using the Git Pager API.

repo.description: The repository name in the format 'owner/repo'. Defaults to 'gina305/switch-code'.

path.description: The filepath within the repository. Defaults to '/'.

key.description: The access token for Github API authentication.
